title: Apply for SNAP Benefits
description: A low-income individual wants to apply for the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP).

tasks.description: Gather applicant's household information, income, and expenses.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately collects all data needed for eligibility determination.

tasks.description: Determine initial eligibility based on the provided information.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system provides a preliminary determination that the applicant is likely eligible.

tasks.description: Submit the application and schedule a follow-up interview with a caseworker.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits the application and schedules the required interview.
